title: 73/215.  Observer status for the European Public Law Organization in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/73/215
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
11 January 2019 
 
18-22534 (E)    150119     
*1822534* 
 
 
Seventy-third session 
Agenda item 176 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 20 December 2018 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/73/462)] 
 
 
 73/215.  Observer status for the European Public Law Organization 
in the General Assembly  
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the European 
Public Law Organization, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the European Public Law Organization to participate in 
the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
62nd plenary meeting  
20 December 2018

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the European Public Law Organization to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
